mapper.insert: insert into repo_measure ( uuid, files, ncss, classes, functions, ccn, java_docs, java_doc_lines, single_comment_lines, multi_comment_lines, commit_id, commit_time, repo_id ) values ( #{uuid}, #{files}, #{ncss}, #{classes}, #{functions}, #{ccn}, #{java_docs}, #{java_doc_lines}, #{single_comment_lines}, #{multi_comment_lines}, #{commit_id}, #{commit_time}, #{repo_id} )
mapper.select: select files,ncss,classes,functions,ccn,java_docs,java_doc_lines,single_comment_lines,multi_comment_lines from repo_measure where repo_id = #{repo_id} order by commit_time desc limit 1

select files,ncss,classes,functions,ccn,java_docs,java_doc_lines,single_comment_lines,multi_comment_lines from repo_measure where repo_id = #{repo_id} and commmit_time < #{time_line} order by commit_time desc limit 1
